sentences.en: A clog or fetter on the equity of redemption is void.
sentences.cn: 阻碍和束缚衡平法上的赎回板均是无效的.

sentences.en: But even know the hell that is beyond redemption.
sentences.cn: 但即使知道是地狱,知道是万劫不复.

sentences.en: He craves redemption for his sins.
sentences.cn: 他渴望赎清自己的罪孽。

sentences.en: He delighted to witness Hindled degrading himself past redemption.
sentences.cn: 他幸灾乐祸地眼看辛德雷堕落得不可救药.

sentences.en: He is a criminal past all redemption.
sentences.cn: 他是个不可救药的罪犯.

sentences.en: I have no doubt that we are polluting the environment beyond redemption.
sentences.cn: 我丝毫都不怀疑我们对环境的污染是不可挽回的。

sentences.en: It was just as well that they didn't, for they were beyond redemption.
sentences.cn: 事实上不知道也好, 因为他们已经是无可挽救的了.

sentences.en: Programme tickets are available for sale or redemption at all Merchandising Centres.
sentences.cn: 课程门券现已于各购货中心公开发售及换购.

sentences.en: Relieving or recovering from a long illness is on one hand redemption.
sentences.cn: 从长期患病中减轻或恢复是在一种救赎.

sentences.en: That blow was proved his redemption.
sentences.cn: 他受了那个打击就改过自新了.

sentences.en: The interest on this account will be paid at redemption.
sentences.cn: 这种帐户的利息在清偿时支付.

sentences.en: The purpose of forgiveness is our reconciliation with God, and our redemption.
sentences.cn: 饶恕的目的就是我们最终与神和好,获得救赎.

sentences.en: The redemption of the sinners is not easy.
sentences.cn: 挽救那些罪人不是易事.

sentences.en: the redemption of the world from sin
sentences.cn: 将世界从罪恶中拯救出来

sentences.en: They visited the Shrine of Our Lady to pray for redemption.
sentences.cn: 他们参观了圣母马利亚的神龛,为赎罪而祈祷.

words.tran_cn: 赎回；拯救；[金融]偿还；实践

phrases.tran_cn: 不可救药的；无法挽回的
肖申克的救赎（电影名称）

trans.tran_en: the state of being freed from the power of evil, believed by Christians to be made possible by Jesus Christ
